head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DOUKAS, MILDRED K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DOUKAS, MILDRED K.

block.p: DOUKAS-Mildred K. beloved wife of the late Kenneth J. Doukas. Loving mother of Karlene Williams and Kenneth J. Doukas Jr. Special grandmother to Basil Williams III and Daphne Williams. Adoring great grandmother to Hayden. Funeral services Wednesday 11 AM at St. Demetrios Greek Orthodox Church, Perth Amboy, New Jersey. Services by Flynn and Son Funeral Home 424 East Avenue, Perth Amboy, New Jersey 732-826-0358
